description: Try our easy to follow Gotzinger Spicy Chorizo Burger recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Gotzinger Spicy Chorizo Burger Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the base of each bread roll on serving plates. Spread salsa on the bread roll base. Top with chorizo patty with melted cheese on top. Layer with lettuce, caramelised red onion and tomato. Spread layer of mayonnaise on bread roll top place on burger. Serve immediately.
